Updates a video room by ID.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Unique ID of the video room","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}

</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"display_name":{"type":"string","example":"Reception"},"max_members":{"type":"integer","example":30},"quality":{"type":"string","example":"720p"},"join_from":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-01-02T00:00:00Z"},"join_until":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-01-02T01:00:00Z"},"remove_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2024-01-02T02:00:00Z"},"remove_after_seconds_elapsed":{"type":"integer","example":3600},"layout":{"type":"string","example":"grid-responsive"},"record_on_start":{"type":"boolean"},"enable_room_previews":{"type":"boolean"},"sync_audio_video":{"type":"boolean"},"meta":{"type":"object"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
